data._comment: Data Policy -- fix later

value.value: https://europeanspallationsource.se/sites/default/files/files/document/2018-05/ESS%20Rules%20for%20Data%20Protection.pdf

data._comment: Data Storage

value.value: All data will be stored at the Data Management and Software Centre located in Copenhagen

data._comment: Data Storage Location

value.value: https://scicat.ess.eu/

data._comment: Data Access

value.value: Principal Investigator and Co-proposers

data._comment: Dataset interoperable

value.value: This dataset achieves interoperability by using the standard Nexus formats

data._comment: Will this dataset be published or shared?
Is the dataset being created or re-used?
Which versioning strategy is applied for this dataset?

value.value: See ESS data policy for more information regarding versioning

data._comment: If yes, under which terms of use or license will the dataset be published or shared?
When will the data be published (if they are)?

value.value: The embargo period last for 3 years after the end of the experiment

data._comment: How will the identity of the person accessing the data be ascertained?

value.value: Users are identified through their OrcID

data._comment: Is there a internal project guideline for naming the data? If so, please briefly outline the naming conventions and, if necessary, link to the documentation.

value.value: feba308c-989c-4f1e-acb4-47529c3ae49f

data._comment: Which standards, ontologies, classifications etc. are used to describe the data and context information?

value.value: At ESS all data is stored in the Nexus format

data._comment: Which metadata are collected automatically?

value.value: Time of flight and NiCOS input are automatically collected and stored with the data

data._comment: Which metadata are collected semi-automatically?

value.value: Information about the sample needs to be filled in the user office system, this is than selected at data collection time by the scientist in NiCOS

data._comment: Which metadata are collected manually?

value.value: Offline processed data can be uploaded to SciCat

data._comment: What are the personnel costs associated with the the creation of metadata and context information in the project?

value.value: Not applicable, ESS will stand for the initial cost of creating the associated metadata for the experiment

data._comment: Which system of persistent identifiers shall be used?
Who is responsible for the maintenance of the PIDs and the object maintenance (i.e. who is responsible notifying the PID-Service about object relocation and the new address)?

value.value: The data management software center division of ESS

data._comment: Is a data access committee needed to handle access requests to the published data of the project?
In case it is unavoidable that you use uncommon or generate project-specific ontologies or vocabularies, will you provide mappings to more commonly used ontologies?
How long is it intended that the data remains re-usable?

value.value: Data will be kept in a maintained state at least 10 years after end of experiment

data._comment: Where will the data (including metadata, documentation and, if applicable, relevant code) be stored or archived after the end of the project?
Have you explored appropriate arrangements with the identified repository?
How will the data management costs of the project be covered?

value.value: ESS will cover the cost for storage for a minimum of ten years
